005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunctionExecutor;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.net.URI;
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements the XPath 3.1
025 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#casting">casting
026 * functions</a>.
027 *
028 * @param <ITEM>
029 *          the Metapath atomic item's Java type
030 */
031public final class CastFunction<ITEM extends IAnyAtomicItem> implements IFunctionExecutor {
032  @NonNull
033  private final ICastExecutor<ITEM> castExecutor;
034
035  @NonNull
036  static <ITEM extends IAnyAtomicItem> IFunction signature(
037      @NonNull URI namespace,
038      @NonNull String name,
039      @NonNull Class<ITEM> resulingAtomicType,
040      @NonNull ICastExecutor<ITEM> executor) {
041    return signature(
042        ObjectUtils.notNull(namespace.toASCIIString()),
043        name,
044        resulingAtomicType,
045        executor);
046  }
047
048  @NonNull
049  static <ITEM extends IAnyAtomicItem> IFunction signature(
050      @NonNull String namespace,
051      @NonNull String name,
052      @NonNull Class<ITEM> resulingAtomicType,
053      @NonNull ICastExecutor<ITEM> executor) {
054    return IFunction.builder()
055        .name(name)
056        .namespace(namespace)
057        .deterministic()
058        .contextIndependent()
059        .focusIndependent()
060        .argument(IArgument.builder()
061            .name("arg1")
062            .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
063            .zeroOrOne()
064            .build())
065        .returnType(resulingAtomicType)
066        .returnZeroOrOne()
067        .functionHandler(newCastExecutor(executor))
068        .build();
069  }
070
071  @NonNull
072  private static <ITEM extends IAnyAtomicItem> CastFunction<ITEM>
073      newCastExecutor(@NonNull ICastExecutor<ITEM> executor) {
074    return new CastFunction<>(executor);
075  }
076
077  private CastFunction(@NonNull ICastExecutor<ITEM> castExecutor) {
078    this.castExecutor = castExecutor;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public ISequence<ITEM> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
083      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
084      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
085      IItem focus) {
086
087    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(
088        ObjectUtils.notNull(arguments.get(0)));
089
090    IAnyAtomicItem item = arg.getFirstItem(true);
091    if (item == null) {
092      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
093    }
094
095    ITEM castItem = castExecutor.cast(item);
096    return ISequence.of(castItem);
097  }
098
099  @FunctionalInterface
100  public interface ICastExecutor<ITEM extends IAnyAtomicItem> {
101    /**
102     * Cast the provided {@code item}.
103     *
104     * @param item
105     *          the item to cast
106     * @return the item cast to the appropriate type
107     */
108    @NonNull
109    ITEM cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item);
110  }
111}
